- Any individual women/ women entrepreneur (s)/ enterprise where women entrepreneurs hold not less than 50% of financial holding. 
- Preference will be given to the categories of women entrepreneurs trained in Rural Self Employment Training Institutes (R-SETIs)/ Skill Development Institutions etc. any other training institute. 
- The applicant should not be a defaulter to any Bank /Financial Institution.

ctu_text: "}]}, {"type": "heading_five", "children": [{"text": ""}]}, {"type": "heading_five", "children": [{"text": "In the eventuality of default on part of beneficiary towards repayment of loan sanctioned under the scheme, the Bank shall recover the balance amount as per their existing procedure and shall ensure that the contribution of Mission Youth is refunded back to the Mission Youth on proportionate basis. "}]}, {"type": "heading_five", "children": [{"text": ""}]}, {"type": "heading_five", "children": [{"text": "In case it is found that the beneficiary has deviated from the indented purpose, Mission Youth, J&K may also initiate legal proceedings against such a person under relevant provisions of law. "}]}, {"type": "heading_five", "children": [{"text": ""}]}, {"type": "heading_five", "children": [{"text": "The selected youth shall furnish an indemnity bond duly attested by a First Class Judicial Magistrate to the following effect:-"}]}, {"type": "heading_five", "children": [{"text": "That she shall establish the sanctioned unit within the period specified in the DPR submitted by her; "}]}, {"type": "heading_five", "children": [{"text": "That she shall incur the sanctioned amount only for the purpose of establishing the said unit; "}]}, {"type": "heading_five", "children": [{"text": "That she is not doing or was not doing any job in Government, Public/Private Sector in Central or any State Government and that he shall not take up any such job without repayment of assistance provided under the scheme; "}]}, {"type": "heading_five", "children": [{"text": "In case it is found that the assistance given has not been utilized by the beneficiary for the indented purposes, Mission Youth may initiate legal proceedings against such a person under relevant provisions of law. "}]}, {"type": "heading_five", "children": [{"text": "That she has not already availed any financial assistance for self employment under any Government scheme.
